original_text: It was Mary Magdalene and Joanna, and Mary the mother of James, and other women that were with them, which told these things unto the apostles.
korean_text: (이 여자들은 막달라 마리아와 요안나와 야고보의 모친 마리아라 또 그들과 함께 한 다른 여자들도 이것을 사도들에게 알리니라)

sentences.original_text: It was Mary Magdalene and Joanna
and Mary the mother of James
and other women that were with them
which told these things unto the apostles
